term.title: organically-modified ceramic

item.text: Chemically bonded hybrid material which is a crosslinked inorganic–organic polymer.

notes.item: Organically modified ceramics are hybrid polymers with inorganic and organic moieties linked by stable covalent bonds and based on organically modified alkoxysilanes, functionalized organic polymers or both.
Though it is a commonly used acronym for organically modified ceramic, 'Ormocer' is a registered trademark and as such its terminological use is strongly discouraged.
